name: Desolate Mind
description:
You are released from prison tonight.  Slash your way through the ranks on the way to exact revenge on the gang leader that framed you for murder.

Desolate Mind is an isometric, cyberpunk, hack n’ slash where you play as a young man betrayed by the gang he thought of as family. After making a deal  to escape prison you hunt down those who have wronged you, enacting your revenge. As the player you will explore different areas, fight groups of different enemies and take down The Boss.

The City

- Explore a dystopian city in a world where the divide between dirt poor and filthy rich is abhorrently apparent.

- Experience an atmosphere as cold and harsh as the inhabitants themselves.

Combat System

- Engage in fast paced, brutal melee combat.

- Fight different enemy types using the moves in your arsenal.

- Use your Dash to quickly reposition and avoid enemy attacks.

- Perfectly time your blocks to parry enemy attacks and deflect projectiles.

- Strike enemies while they are staggered to deal massive damage.

Specifications

Estimated Playtime: 10-20 minutes
